name: WebGLCanvas

props.name: create
props.description: Create a program bound to the provided WebGL2 context and canvas.

props.name: dprMax
props.description: Clamp devicePixelRatio to avoid excessive fill-rate on hi-DPI screens.

props.name: timeScale
props.description: Global time scaling applied to dt and absolute time t.

props.name: clearColor
props.description: Optional clear color, defaults to transparent. Only sets clearColor, not clearing each frame.

props.name: asBackground
props.description: If true, wrapper is absolutely positioned and fills its parent.

props.name: sx
props.description: Inline styles for the wrapper (supports CSS variables via Sx).

props.name: canvasClassName
props.description: Optional className for the inner canvas element.

props.name: preset
props.description: One or many style-preset names registered via `definePreset()`

bestPractices: Prefer low DPR on animated backgrounds to reduce fill-rate.
Avoid heavy per-frame allocations in program.update().
Dispose GL resources on unmount to prevent leaks.
